ygData.subject: What else can be said besides THE END IS NEAR...
ygData.msgSnippet: Arrow manages back to the ship that Perplex and his lame gang arrived on. He examines it to see why it s broken. A wire had come loose. He put the wire back in

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Arrow manages back to the ship that Perplex and his lame gang arrived on. H=
e examines it to see why it's broken. A wire had come loose. He put the wir=
e back in and the ship turned on. He rolled his eyes because of how stupid =
Perplex was. He got into the ship and flew off. Arrow was gone. That's righ=
t, gone.
~~~~~
Deemos goes to Sharpedge.

Deemos: Sharpedge, that idiot Per=
plex called you out, he's standing right outside. I say you go out there an=
d finish him off once and for all!
~~~~~
Suddenly, a bolt of energy came do=
wn. It was revealed to be. No! It can't be! But sadly, it is.

The Artist: =
Wow! This planet again!? Who would have ever thought! Not me! Well, since D=
eemos killed me, I guess I should go back to him like an idiot! Hahaha!

Ar=
tist ran towards the Chosen Mafia base while humming. He didn't know where =
the base even was, but he somehow ran in the right direction....Yeah, that'=
s it. Can we get a guy out here to supply the writer with some good ideas? =
(BANG!)
~~~~~
Plintissa returns suddenly!

Plintissa: Oh, no! Iron Raptor, =
help me!

She was right in the middle of the Chosen Mafia base.

Plintissa:=
 Uh, oh.

Holocaust pulls out his sword and slashes Plintissa into a millio=
n pieces. She's dead Jim.
~~~~~
Suddenly, Diskus comes back.

Diskus: What =
happened?

He turns around and sees the Chosen Mafia base, with some idiot =
standing out front. (Perplex)

Diskus: I'll just bide my time, then see who=
 is in that base.
~~~~~
Sinesis and Sinister return.

Sinister: Ha, I'm bac=
k.

He whistles stupidly.

Sinesis: So what? I was Soulstice's first charac=
ter!

Sinister: Dude, didn't you hear? He may have been Soulstice when you =
first came in, but now he's The Gunslinger.

Sinesis: You bastard!

Siniste=
r: Sir, I believe it's "you slaghead."

Sinesis pulls out his sword and sla=
shes Sinister into a million pieces. He's dead Jim.

Sinesis: Ha! Hmm?

Sud=
denly, Stranato shows up?

Stranato: Hello, as one of Roland's best charact=
ers, I felt I had to return.

Sinesis: I'm his first, so I'm his best. So t=
here.

Stranato: You fool! There were very few characters worse than you! J=
ust Plintissa and Gangon. And maybe Testifier. Definitely Technosis, and I =
hate to tell you this, but you just generally sucked because you thought yo=
u were everything! You thought you were Edge and Christian, you thought you=
 were Hulk Hogan, you thought you were Goku, you thought you were Bill Clin=
ton, anything possible! And your brother only made you lamer! Why'd you mod=
e your way into bases? Why did you do it? And why did you keep switching si=
des, you f'n retard!

Sinesis: Waaaah! Stop!

Stranato pulls out his sword =
and slashes Sinesis into a million pieces. He's dead Jim.

Stranato: And th=
at's that.

He looks back to his ship nearby. Stronghold and Blender steppe=
d out.

Stronghold: Roland found it was a mistake to get rid of us!

Blende=
r: Yeah, he only hated Rizopas, Doom Ice, Airbomber, and Train Wreck, the 3=
 of us and Arrow were the ones he liked, but Arrow ran his course, see.

St=
ranato: Okay! I get it! Now then, who should we join?

Stranato, Stronghold=
, and Blender see the Chivtron base.

Stranato: Hey! I remember them!

The =
3 of them approach the base.

Stranato: Chivtrons, we have something to say=
!...
